description:
Brand new to Airbnb hosting! Our newly renovated one bedroom is located 1/2 flight up in a beautiful brownstone. The apartment features brand new appliances, high ceilings, exposed brick and a massive sectional including pull out. You'll feel right at home in our apartment.

Exposed brick walls, 15 foot ceilings, renovated prewar brownstone

We are here to answer any questions you may have.

Neighborhood vibe in the big city.

Local subway less than 5 minutes away from the apartment. Bus is 2 minutes away. Don't forget about Uber!
name: Spacious & New Upper West Side 1 Bd
review: Great location for a great price. Elizabeth was very nice and helpful.
